Privacy Policy

Last Updated: October 2, 2024

Overview

Daily Decider is committed to protecting your privacy. This policy explains how we handle information when you use our decision-making and compliment generator app.

Data Collection

We do not collect or store any personal information. All decision-making and compliment generation happens locally in your browser. No user data is transmitted to our servers.

Local Storage

We may use browser local storage to save your preferences and history for a better user experience. This data remains on your device and is never transmitted elsewhere.

Analytics

We use basic analytics to understand how our app is used, but this data is anonymized and contains no personally identifiable information.

Third-Party Services

We do not share any data with third-party services.

Contact

If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us at: info@bullrushinvestments.com
